name: flower-ecommerce-server
description: Backend server for flower e-commerce application

scripts.dev: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r frontend/dist/* public/ && tsx watch src/index.ts
scripts.before-build: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r frontend/dist/* public/ && tsc
scripts.vercel:build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r frontend/dist/* public/ && npm run build:server
scripts.vercel:dev: npm run vercel:build && npm run vercel:start
